applet.name: AlbumFlow
applet.title: Album Flow
applet.desc: Browse your albums with a scrolling cover art view similar to the Cover Flow view on Mac and iPod. It can also act as a screensaver scrolling through all albums in your library.
applet.creator: Erland Isaksson

applet.name: CustomClock
applet.title: Custom Clock
applet.desc: A screensaver for Squeezebox Controller/Touch/Radio devices that shows a clock. It is possible to select among a number of different styles and you can configure what kind of date/time information you like to show.
applet.creator: Erland Isaksson

applet.name: ScreenSwitcher
applet.title: Screen Switcher
applet.desc: Switch continuously between different screen savers.
applet.creator: Erland Isaksson
